An original plot, believeable, well-developed characters, and a great villain (Mabry) has me eagerly awaiting the sequel, "The Gates of Byzantium". Highly recommended, and is up there, in my opinion, with "The Colony" series by Michaelbrent Collings and the "Arisen" series by Glynn James and Michael Stephen Fuchs; two of my current favs which horror fans should definitely check out.

Well written and edited. Kept me on the edge of my seat and fully engaged in the story. Characters had a real quality to them that a lot of the other zombie/vampire books are lacking. Can't wait for the next.... Keep em coming Sam!

This was a great book, lots of action, engaging characters, and a way above average plot. I loved Will and Danny, funny, dangerous and human. I don't write reviews for books, but had to on this one it was so enjoyable. So often books start off with a bang and fizzle out, the author keeps you interested from beginning to end in this great horror story, with twists and turns that had me guessing over and over about the plot.

I thought at first this was going to be another "zombie" book but it's really much more than that. I have thoroughly enjoyed this book as well as book two in the series. I'm now into book three and still enjoying the reading. I'm wondering where the series is going at this point though and I wonder if I will have to wait for a book four.

I don't usually write a review for a lot of books I read, but this author was awesome. I have read many zombie, end of the world books, but this is the best. Action..Action..Action... never a dull moment. I didn't want to stop and will move on to the next book. Read this... you won't be disappointed. Very different from other books of its kind.

As a hungry reader of dystopian fiction, I was pleasantly surprised at the originality and writing of The Purge. I appreciated the storyline and the characters. The plot twists kept me reading into the wee hours of the morning which allowed me to join the adventures in my dreams. I am anxious to start book 2 and see what's in store for us next!

Usually not into the non-conventional zombie genres... more of a "theoretically possible" zombie apocalypse scenario kind of guy for however much a zombie apocalypse could be theoretically possible. However, everything about Sam Sisavath's writings are completely captivating and keep you drawn in and on edge. Definitely a page turner.

So good.  Creepy and awesome.  I read a sample because it was a recommended book on Amazon and i couldn't buy it fast enough once the sample ended.  This book Is long scary creepy adventure.  Reminds me of Blake crouches books like run and the pines.  If you enjoyed those you'll love these.  I finished the second book onto the third one now.

I have to admit that I really never dreamed that I would be so taken with this type of reading material.  This was a very different take on what I originally thought would be your standard zombie type of novel. It is a cross of alien invasion, zombie and Dracula type novels.  I am looking forward to the next book in the series!

An entertaining read. I've read several others in this genre and enjoy most. I don't get particularly hung up on the small things so I plow through items other might find annoying.  I've read through most of the others and though I do like some of these serials, I'm getting a bit tired of these. I guess I want more resolution quicker.

When I first started reading this book I expected another typical PA zombie book. I was pleasantly surprised.  This story has all the makings of a quality tale in the same vein as the walking dead. Very few zombie PA stories come close to TWD. This one is right up there. Let's hope the it continues throughout the series.

I've read several post-apocalyptic series, and this series ranks one of the best I've read so far.  I've already read the first 3 books in as many days because I can't put these books down.  Fantastic writing that stays interesting the whole way through.  I whole-heartedly recommend this series to anyone.  Seriously.

I have started several Zombie novels in the last few months and then put them down. I was very disappointed until I began reading the " Purge ". I,m halfway through the second book and don't expect to put it down until I finish the series. And then again I will face disappointment. I love the series. T. B.

Start saving your pennies now, because after reading this you're gonna want to stock up on guns and ammo. The Purge of Babylon (and the rest of the series) is a fine twist on the traditional end-of-the-world zombie story. What the characters lack in depth they make up for in snappy dialog and ghoul-stomping grit.

This is the beginning of an awesome series.  Once I started reading, I was hooked, and immediately purchased the other books in the series.  If you love post apocalyptic monsters/zombies, you'll love this book.  Great action, very scary moments, and a lot of fun.  I wish there were 10 more books in this series!

This was a well thought out, plot & character rich story, that even had a few LOL moments. And, a few OH S&*T moments too, the kind that makes you read realllllly fast at the edge of your seat... the sex scenes were decent as well. Not that many, but what can one expect in a SHTF situation? Overall great read.

Story line believably introduced and maintained.  Characters well developed and likable.  I had a hard time putting this book down.  I found only a couple of editorial errors And the story line was strong enough that they were not really distracting.  If this is your genre, you don't want to miss this one.

Awesome book!  Had me at the edge of my seat many many times.  I really enjoyed the character interactions.  They felt natural.  The writing style pushed me along as scenes played out effortlessly.  What a great book!  Continuing on to the next one now!

The different characters all have a different perspectives. While not the best written book, I found myself ripping though some pages, anxious to know what happens next, and chuckling through the next ones. It was something different in the genera of zombie apocalypse books. I had fun with this one.
Nice twist to genre, getting book 2 now

I like the author's use of humor .... I think it is twist on the supernatural apocalypse them. I like the warriors being real ex-soldiers to give some explanation for skills and ability to survive. But really is the end of the world the best time for a handsome soldier to find a pretty girlfriend?

Unlike most books of this genre it has a unique plot that is not easy to guess what is going to happen next. It is one of the best written true to life character interaction in any book I have read. I was about 25% into the book and I had to stop and look to see if other books were in the series.

I am not usually a fan of zombie /end of the world fiction, but this series is the exception to the rule. Very well written with interesting characters and a plot that I can't guess the end to. Have read all four books so far available, and am looking forward to number five. Highly recommended.

I have never been a fan of zombie stories but this one made a believer out of me, and gave me an Intense desire for more. The author vividly depicts a world of horror and develops a plot that takes the reader on a wild ride of twists and turns and breathtaking suspense. Book two, here I come!!

Loved this book. It's great discovering a book that is part of a series that's already written. Now I don't have to wait for the next book. One of the things that I loved was the sense of humor. I actually found myself laughing out loud,and that's not easy to do. Now I get to start book two.

Excellent story line, especially with the two Army Rangers as the lead characters.  Have bought the entire series of books and look forward to reading them all.  You are one of my favorite authors in telling about the Zombies. Keep up the good work and I will buy every one of your new books.

So happy I purchased all three of these at the same time!  Good writing, great story; felt right at home and loved the hours of reading!  These are all well written and long (nothing is better than a really long, really good story!) Not really zombie/not really vampire, but great reading!

The Purge of Babylon by Sam Sisavath:  I found this book to be suspenseful and exciting.  There was one twist that I was not expecting.  I do not get nightmares with any book or movie of this genre.  This one gave me two nights of nightmares.  it was a good read and plan to get book II.

Great story, but I will agree with other reviewers at how quickly a character recovers from wounds.  But hey, it's science fiction, I got over it and just went with it.  Is it any harder to believe than the creatures they are fighting?  Vampire like creatures.  Definitely worth reading!
Excellent series. You won't be sorry.

I'm hard to please, but I found this book to be a great read.  It grabbed me and held me.  Love the banter between Will and Danny, and the plot keeps you guessing.  Just finished this one, off to get the rest.  If the first book is any indication, this is going to be a good series.

Yet another new take on the vampire genre. Some of this genre are just a rehash of older books on the subject. This one is unique. It is also a mystery. Characterization is spot on and the plot moves along at a nice pace. I recommend this book to those who appreciate a great story.

This is one of the best horror series by an independent author that I have read! Not only is it well written with interesting characters, the "big bads" are genuinely creepy and there are many suspenseful moments. I've read every book in the series and can't wait for more!

This the 1st book of that you can read and really enjoy  an amazing ride with the feeling of really being there.  Ican't wait for number 6 out in March 2015 according to his site. I'm not much of writer  but I love to read and would have given this series a 10 if I could have.

The book that started it all - original, addictive, fast pasted, unexpected vision of the future. This book is clearly ahead of the pack in this genre. Rich character development, unexpected plots twists. Trust me, when you end this book, you'll run to purchase the next one.

Totally in Love with Danny and Will. Love the banter between them and the lighthearted way they deal with the situations that arise. It makes the story enjoyable and fun even if it is a world ending plot. Not your typical he-man- ex military- no nonsense Rambo style heroes.

A book that is going to take your breath and make you hold it! While reading this book, I found myself clenching the book and holding my breath for so long that I became light headed! I love love this book. Buy it, read it, you will be hooked!  SAM SISAVATH YOU ROCK!!!

Now THIS is how you start a series!  Will and Danny are two fantastic characters.  And it is and it isn't your typical post-apocalyptic/zombie plot.  The enemy is intelligent and things seem pretty hopeless for the home team.  I can't wait to start book 2.  Bravo, Sam.

I stumbled on this series while looking for something that would keep me busy for a while.  This worked!  So far, I've read all 3 available books, the two Lemuria titles and am anxiously awaiting the next installment.  Thanks, Sam and keep them coming, Great characters!

Not only was it one of the best books I've ever read, but it's REALLY nice and long also. I just spent the last two days unable to put it down. And I can't wait to read the next book by this author. I will definitely be recommending this book to family and friends.

I thought it would be hard to find a writer that held my interest as well as Stephen King.  I was wrong this is a very well written book and I enjoyed it immensely.  I'm now reading the second book in the series (The Gates of Byzantium)  and am enjoying it as well.

I don't write too many reviews for books and I'm not really going to bother with one here since I think everything I would say has been covered in prior reviews. Just read it already, you won't regret it. This is the best series I have read in a long time!

I discovered this author purely by accident however I quickly became a fan.  The story line is good and moves quickly. The characters are well written and witty. This is my first "zombie" story and thoroughly enjoyed every page. Kudos to you Sam Sisaveth!

Not your typical "PA" nor "Z" book.  The action is non-stop, the enemy is horrific, and the main characters are likeable.  Add to that a novel idea and good solid writing and you've got a real hard time being able to it down.  Great read!

I've been on an End of the World reading binge for a few months.  This series is one of the best I've read. You MUST read the series in order or you will be hopelessly confused.  I love the action and the characters in all the books. Well worth reading.

I just finished WJ Lundy's series and thought "What now?"  Well, thank God I found Sam's series.  Great start to what I'm hoping is another great ride for me.  Great story and more importantly, great characters.  Looking forward to the second book.

I'm really digging this series. Just finished up book one and can't wait to get started on book two. I hope the series keeps the same momentum and story feel. This series would make an awesome movie. Thanks for the entertaining story Mr. Sisavath.

About days when people become infected like zombies. But from what i am reading so far it sound like it is mixed of vampire/zombir. Because it will eat tear your skin like zombie yet it will drink blood at same time. Its pretty interesting tho.

I am not usually a fan of this kind of book but a couple of chapters in and I was hooked.  Great writer.  Zero fill.  Every sentence has a purpose and propels you toward the next chapter.  I will definitely be reading the next in the series.

This book was thoroughly entertaining. I love the back and forth banter between the characters. The book as written is also much longer than some of the other recent books I've read which makes for a longer enjoyable read. Highly recommend.

Really enjoyed this book, a real page turner, had twists and turns I didn't see coming, very original! There were very few moments in the book that were slow paced, strapped in the first chapter and didn't let off the gas until the en

I really liked this story because it flowed well, had likeable charactors and good monsters that follow some of the traditional vampire traits but have their own too. Will and Danny are good charactors and you want them to succeed.

The Purge series is one of the best Post-Apocalyptic reads out there. I'd rate it right up there with Arisen, Extinction Horizon and Whiskey Tango Foxtrot. The Ghouls are unlike anything else which makes this unique and thrilling.

Although a few characters are cliché, the overall story is pretty good. The back-and-forth banter between the two former Rangers is particularly believable. The book is certainly good enough to give the second in the series a try.

When people start turning into ghouls and killing people, what would you do?  Two ex Army Rangers know what to do and start kicking butt.  Fun read with well developed characters.  Definitely going to read the next installment.

Bravo wonderful series I think the best books I've read this year. Read the 2nd and 3rd book in one day no matter how hard I just could not put them down will be purchasing all books for this series in the future I cannot wait.

Didn't think I would like it.  By a quarter of the way through, I couldn't put it down. Excellent action description, just the right amount of dialogue, and excellent and diverse characters.  Very talented author.  Well done.

I really liked the book. I was hooked from the beginning and was curious to see what would happened next. The characters were relatable and likable. The storyline was easy to follow but kept you guessing. Highly recommended.

The novel is well written, which I appreciate. The characters are likeable, and I am now on book two of the series.  I plan to read all the books in the series since I find them enjoyable reading when relaxing or traveling.

Great book, Sam did a great job of building tension and keeping me on the edge, and the flow of the story, as well as his detail, was phenomenal. Great job Sam! Already on the second book and it is great as well. Cheers!

There are good books and then there are books that change the genre around. This is a fascinating book with maybe zombies. Maybe vampires. Maybe something new that we've never seen before. Can't wait to read the sequels!

Dialogue is lacking punch, and far too much repetition in conveying the character's thoughts. A lot of the dialogue serves as empty filler, and doesn't move the story forward. The two main characters grow on you though.

Hello, this book is really good.  The author does an excellent job of telling the story.  I still do not know exactly what the creatures are.  I hope to find out in the next book.  GREAT read.  Just my opinion.  Thanks.

This was a great story liked all the characters loved the playful banter between Will and Danny kept the story light and no so dark all the time The story was well written all in all good book definitely worth reading

This book had my heart racing the entire time. When  things happen in places you are intimately familiar with they tend to have that effect.  Well written with good character development.  Can't wait to read book 2.

ok I am on book 4 ...u had me on book one ...2 days until I get pre ordered book 4 cant wait to see what the boys are up to now although it like will is gona ket his nards clipped when he gets back to song.... lmao!

this story starts right off with a lot of action love the group of people in the series Will and Danny are top guys and they have some funny times and some almost unbelievable fighting times you will love this book

I love the rolling sense of danger and excitement this author gives to the protagonist. Antagonist seemed genuinely generic at first but then fully bloomed halfway through the novel. I can't wait for the next book.

Really liked this book, except for the end which was stupid. Really, they did not have people on alert for attacks, and come on, they did not realize that UV light was available all this time to fight the ghouls?

a little long winded and at times to far fetched, even for me. It got better towards the end though, and because of it I probably will read the second book now just to find out what happens to our six survivors.

I simply could not put this book down! As a fan of apocalyptic fiction, I was enthralled from start to finish. If you're a fan of "The Walking Dead", or Stephen King's "The Stand", you're gonna love this book!

When I first started reading I found it a little troubling. But at the same time I was mesmerized and couldn't stop. Now I'm looking forward to the next book in the series. Would make a jellybean TV series.

I would highly recommend this to anyone who is into the zombie/survival genre! Great story with some intense excellent twists and turns keeping you on your toes throughout the book...a definite must read!

I really got into this book and couldn't stop reading.  Lucky it was a day off so I didn't have to!  Must read the following books to learn about various characters' survival and who is behind the Purge.

Finally, a new idea for the standard zombie - apocalypse storyline.  Interesting, and original,  approach to a well worn genre.  Best part is that this author took time to write well and edit his work.

I absolutely love this series! I love all of the characters and the plot. I'm so glad I gave this book a try! I was barely able to put it down and I've really enjoyed all the others in the series too!
I highly recommend this book! As an avid reader, I love books that hold me from the beginning and keeps you locked in and this book does just that. Really incredible story line. A definite must read!
This is some of the best written material I have read.  Easy to follow the characters and the adventures are believable.  I'm looking forward to staying with these adventurers for many more chapters.
I enjoyed reading the story and the characters, but it seemed as if I was reading another book in the "Strain" series. Every thing about the ghouls was the same as the vampires in the Strain.
I was very pleasantly surprised by this book. It is fast paced, enjoyable, and well written. The characters are fun and the plot is thrilling. I keep wishing for more volumes. Keep up the good work!
I couldn't put the book down. Great story,still can't figure out exactly where it is leading so I will get to book 2 immediately. If you love stories about the apocalypse definitely dive this a try.
Anyone who enjoys apocalypse books will enjoy this book. Fast paced, has humor, and a lot of guns and death. A different antagonist then the cookie cutter zombie books makes me want to read more.
A word of warning if you read this book be prepared to read the rest. I got the first one and after thirty minutes bought the next four so I would be ready to read them when I finished the first.
Different kind of zombie story with an intriguing twist to the plot. I enjoyed this book and the characters. Action packed with the author not drifting off on tangents while telling this story.
An excellent twist on the apocalypse.  After reading countless zombie books which were all very similar, now we have what seems to be sort of a zombie/vampire hybrid.  It's well worth a read.
Very impressive thrill ride; a roller coaster of a story that is enthralling and nearly impossible to put down.  I'm delighted there are more books in this series.  Well, on to the next one!
Excellent read. The series continues to keep me riveted. No book is perfect but this one will keep you wanting more. The main characters, Will & Danny, have a banter that is hard to come by.
A compulsive read.  One of the most entertaining books I have read in a long time.  When you're first thought of the day is how soon can I get back to reading that book, you know it is good!
Wonderful series. I loved this book, couldn't put it down. Will and Danny make wonderful characters, terror, murder, mystery, romance all rolled into one book. Can't wait to read next one.
I am really enjoying this book. The characters are relatable and well written. The conversations are interesting and entertaining. The storyline is new and fresh. Thank you Mr. Sisavath.
It was a great book. It was a little slow going at first but once I gave it a chance it kept me on the edge of my seat and I couldn't put it down. Can't wait to see what happens next!!!
The moment I started reading this book,I found it impossible to put down. The story is fast paced and enjoyable to read. I highly recommend this book to anyone looking for a good read.
Will and Danny are great characters, and their humour in crisis is hilarious. Keep up the great work Sam and I will continue chortling over Danny,s dark humour at inappropriate times.
Character development is outstanding! Sense of humor for a couple of ex-Rangers, now current SWAT, is dead on. Warriors under pressure use humor to deal with the chaos. Excellent read
This was a great read!  The writing isn't quite as refined as some other authors, but this isn't a Steinbeck novel.  Take it for what it is:  a zombie novel, and a hell of a fun one.
Great first book.  I like the different perspective narrative.  Glad there are more books in this story because it's a story of evolution and extinction and survival of the fittest.
Great read! Had trouble putting it down, the story seems so realistic throughout. After I completed it I downloaded the next book in the series and am anxious to get started on it.
Exciting action,  people you grow to care about,  a smattering of drama and just the right amount of humor.  So far an excellent start of a series.  Wonderful book Mr. Sisavath!
I don't usually read zombie survival books but this was a really good book.  The characters are developed real well and the story is good.  Will start the next book immediately.
A great post event book!  I enjoyed every page especially the ending!  A very nice job of creative writing by Mr. Sisavath!!  I recommend this to all for your reading pleasure!
I really like the way Sam Sisavath writes. The jokes and sarcastic comments of Will and Danny really funny. The ending was smart too. It left me wanting to start the next book.
I am a big fan. I am on the third book now and hope they keep coming. He is a great writer, I love the characters, storyline, and I can't wait to see how this ends eventually.
Very entertaining series. Likable characters, non-stop action, scary monsters. Who could ask for more? I can! More! Only thing better than more books would be a FX TV series!
as many stories of fiction, it is the development of characters that is an entertainment factor.  having said this, the background, at least through Book 1 is underdeveloped.
Good pace to this story, which is a good post apocalyptic zombie book.  It was fun to read, and has many surprising twists.  The characters are the best part of the story.
Good writing, good characters, nice spin on the end of days. A lot like The Strain in theme but from a broader view from the outliers who group together trying to survive.
What a blast! These whole series flows like ghouls on a moonless night (I mean that as a complement).  Funny, scary, fast-paced, great characters - a very enjoyable read!
Very good book. The characters and story are very well researched and developed.  The story flows from moment and moment, easily transitioning to character to character.
I liked it enough to buy the second in the series which is good also. Good characters and plenty of action, once your into it the book will be done before you know it.
Thought I would try this author,I couldn't stop reading and finished in a day.Have to buy the next one even I found it a bit shallow but I have to know what happens.
I enjoyed reading this author and will look forward to more of the same type of book. His characters are well fleshed out and the original content kept me guessing.

Overall good book. Characters were funny, ending was weak, but good none the less. Probably won't read any more in the series after the ending of this one though.
This is a great series.  It is a different take on TEOTWAWKI, and I'm enjoying as Sam takes us on the journey.  I recommend it if you enjoy this kind of thing.

This book was absolutely riveting! I have already recommended it to my friends. I already bought the rest of the series and can not wait to see what happens!
I loved reading this book I couldn't put it down.  There was never a boring part in this book everything sense I can't wait to start reading the second book.
Great apocalyptic story. Well written with lots of action. Was hard to put down and I bought the 2nd book in the series as soon as I was done with this one.
This one of the best series of books I have ever read. I am on the 4th book now and can not put it down. It is non stop action. These books are a must read.
Don't  get caught in the dark.  The ghouls rule the night.  They are smart and they are determined to take over the world.  Only a few survive.  Could you?
Love the plot - exciting, frightening, but enjoy the humor between some of the characters.  Well written and sorry that I am on the last book of the series
Love this twist on classic post apocalyptic zombie story.  Characters are well developed, and the book is easy to read.  On to the second in the series...
Fashionable tale of a vampire apocalypse, great for the plane, beach or sitting by the pool. Fast paced and a few twists that keep you turning the pages.
I loved this book! A new twist on the walking deal and vampires. If you are a fan of apocalyptic stories this one is for you. Getting the next book now.
Really enjoyed this book, great debut by Sam Sisavath.  Good characters, fast paced, and fun, highly recommended for anyone who likes a good easy read.
When I began this book was not sure if I would enjoy it but continued reading and found it to be one of my favorite. Ready to read more of this author.

Really enjoyed the book. Easy to read and follow and realistic. If your a person who dreams about what they read you might not want to read this.

Awesome read! Very addictive. Enjoyed the characters, plot, and original concept. Can't wait to start reading his other novels! Try it.
